allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Replace Tesseract with EasyOCR for improved OCR accuracy

- Add EasyOCR as primary OCR engine \(100% score accuracy vs 0% with Tesseract\)
- Add CLAHE contrast enhancement for better text recognition
- Update OCR engine to support both EasyOCR and Tesseract \(configurable\)
- Add debug mode to save extracted regions to data/debug/ for troubleshooting
- Update config.yaml with corrected scoreboard coordinates
- Add match processor module for automated extraction pipeline
- Add OCR benchmark script for comparing OCR methods
- Improve screenshot capture with max quality PNG settings

OCR improvements tested against ground truth data:
- Score extraction: 100% accuracy \(EasyOCR + CLAHE\)
- Name extraction: 90% fuzzy match accuracy

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
